alert.note: Alert for Bay; Gulf (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 18 at 2:24PM EDT until June 18 at 3:15PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Gulf County in the Panhandle of Florida... Southeastern Bay County in the Panhandle of Florida... * Until 315 PM EDT/215 PM CDT/. * At 223 PM EDT/123 PM CDT/, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 12 miles northeast of Lynn Haven to near Callaway to 14 miles southwest of Tyndall Air Force Base, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Panama City, Callaway, Port St. Joe, Springfield, Mexico Beach, Stonemill Creek, Tyndall Air Force Base, Parker, Wewahitchka, Honeyville, Allanton, Cedar Grove, Chipola Cutoff, Beacon Beach, College Station, Bayou George, Camp Flowers, Overstreet, Milltown and Davis Beach. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
